thread.title: Re: ‘F*ck your shoes’! Bradley Whitford (the dbag from Billy Madison) attacks Ivanka over faith tweet
thread.title_full: Re: ‘F*ck your shoes’! Bradley Whitford (the dbag from Billy Madison) attacks Ivanka over faith tweet

author: Orpheus75
title: Re: ‘F*ck your shoes’! Bradley Whitford (the dbag from Billy Madison) attacks Ivanka over faith tweet
text:
‘F*ck your shoes’! Bradley Whitford (the dbag from Billy Madison) attacks Ivanka over faith tweet Posted at 10:09 am on February 23, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
As Twitchy reported, Ivanka Trump spoke out about religious tolerance on Twitter and was attacked with a gross amount of intolerance … because what else should we expect from the Left at this point. Here is her tweet which offended them so greatly: America is a nation built on the principle of religious tolerance. We must protect our houses of worship & religious centers. #JCC 
— Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) February 20, 2017 
Gosh how dare she call for us to protect our houses of worship, she’s such a monster. 
Oh, and speaking of monster … Your father is a racist birther. Steve Bannon an anti-Semitic opportunist. You and your husband are enabling hatred. Fuck your shoes. https://t.co/38MK86msM2 
— Bradley Whitford (@WhitfordBradley) February 22, 2017 
Yeah, there’s a reason Bradley Whitford always plays a jerk – it just seems to come so naturally to him, right? @WhitfordBradley @madtruthbomber she needs to be quiet.Her own father is the reason people won't buy her brand 
— the pink protagonist (@ProtagonistPink) February 22, 2017 Trending
